about_the_game:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes. Two new buttons will be added in the options screen: one to toggle nudity artwork on/off, and the other to enable explicit erotic texts on/off. This way you can customize the experience better.

Requires the main game Planet Stronghold 2 to download:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/857200/Planet_Stronghold_2/

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit uncensored sex scenes, as well as frequent nudity.

All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content.

detailed_description:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes. Two new buttons will be added in the options screen: one to toggle nudity artwork on/off, and the other to enable explicit erotic texts on/off. This way you can customize the experience better.

Requires the main game Planet Stronghold 2 to download:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/857200/Planet_Stronghold_2/
name: Planet Stronghold 2 - Uncensor Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
